INSERT INTO exchange_order_record(
exchange_id,
exchange_name,
old_unit_code,
old_unit_status,
old_coupon_name,
old_batch_code,
old_coupon_type,
new_unit_code,
new_batch_code,
new_coupon_name,
new_coupon_type,

order_code,
conversion_status,
create_time,
update_time,
platform_id,
order_amount,

) VALUES (
#{exchangeId},
#{exchangeName},
#{oldUnitCode},
#{oldUnitStatus},
#{oldCouponName},
#{oldBatchCode},
#{oldCouponType},
#{newUnitCode},

#{orderAmount},
#{newCouponBatchName},

)

mapper.update:
UPDATE exchange_order_record
exchange_id = #{exchangeId},
exchange_name = #{exchangeName},
old_unit_code = #{oldUnitCode},
old_unit_status = #{oldUnitStatus},
old_coupon_name = #{oldCouponName},
old_batch_code = #{oldBatchCode},
old_coupon_type = #{oldCouponType},
new_unit_code = #{newUnitCode},
new_batch_code = #{newBatchCode},
new_coupon_name = #{newCouponName},
new_coupon_type = #{newCouponType},
user_mail = #{userMail},
exchange_time = #{exchangeTime},
order_code = #{orderCode},
conversion_status = #{conversionStatus},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
order_amount = #{orderAmount},
new_coupon_batch_name = #{newCouponBatchName},
old_coupon_batch_name = #{oldCouponBatchName},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE exchange_order_record
exchange_id = #{po.exchangeId},
exchange_name = #{po.exchangeName},
old_unit_code = #{po.oldUnitCode},
old_unit_status = #{po.oldUnitStatus},
old_coupon_name = #{po.oldCouponName},
old_batch_code = #{po.oldBatchCode},
old_coupon_type = #{po.oldCouponType},
new_unit_code = #{po.newUnitCode},
new_batch_code = #{po.newBatchCode},
new_coupon_name = #{po.newCouponName},
new_coupon_type = #{po.newCouponType},
user_mail = #{po.userMail},
exchange_time = #{po.exchangeTime},
conversion_status = #{po.conversionStatus},
create_time = #{po.createTime},
update_time = #{po.updateTime},
platform_id = #{po.platformId},
order_amount = #{po.orderAmount},
new_coupon_batch_name = #{newCouponBatchName},
old_coupon_batch_name = #{oldCouponBatchName},
WHERE order_code = #{po.orderCode}
